sceneObjects
Interface ISceneObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
Box, Camera, Cylinder, Disc, Mesh, Rectangle, Scene, SceneObject, Sphere, Triangle
public interface ISceneObject

This interface represents the objects to be used in the scene (i.e spehre , box).

Method Summary
 void commit()
          Finishes parsing the scene object and validates that all mandatory values were given and valid.
 ISurface getSurface()
          Returns the surface of the object.
 Intersection isIntersects(IRay ray)
          Return the intersection information for a given ray.
 Point2D parametrize(IPoint3D point3d)
          Returns the 2D point which maps the given 3D point to a texture (or checkers pattern).
 void parseParameter(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String[] args)
          Parses the given parameters to create a scene object.
 void setSurface(ISurface surface)
          Sets the surface of the object (i.e Flat surface).

                    java.lang.String[] args)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException
Parses the given parameters to create a scene object.

isIntersects

Intersection isIntersects(IRay ray)
Return the intersection information for a given ray. Use the returned object to check if there was a 'hit' or 'miss'.

Parameters:
ray -
Returns:
The intersection information for a given ray.
